p: The papain like protease (PLP) is also an essential component of the SARS-CoV replication machinery. PLP is the nsp3 protein which is part of the synthesized ORF1a polyprotein during replication. nsp3 cleaves protease recognition sites between nsp1/2, nsp2/3 and nsp3/4 [ 37]. In addition to its protease activity, nsp3 has been shown to have deubiquitination, and interferon antagonist activities in vitro [ 38]. Since its homologues are found in all coronaviruses, it has also been proposed to be a good target for drug discovery for both SARS-CoV and other human coronaviruses.
